description: The bubble legend is an additional element in legend which presents the scale of the bubble series. Individual bubble ranges can be defined by user or calculated from series. In the case of automatically calculated ranges, a 1px margin of error is permitted.

children.name: borderColor
children.description: The color of the ranges borders, can be also defined for an individual range.

samples.name: Similar look to the bubble series

children.name: borderWidth
children.description: The width of the ranges borders in pixels, can be also defined for an individual range.

children.name: className
children.description: An additional class name to apply to the bubble legend' circle graphical elements. This option does not replace default class names of the graphical element.

children.name: color
children.description: The main color of the bubble legend. Applies to ranges, if individual color is not defined.

samples.name: Similar look to the bubble series

children.name: connectorClassName
children.description: An additional class name to apply to the bubble legend's connector graphical elements. This option does not replace default class names of the graphical element.

children.name: connectorColor
children.description: The color of the connector, can be also defined for an individual range.

children.name: connectorDistance
children.description: The length of the connectors in pixels. If labels are centered, the distance is reduced to 0.

children.name: connectorWidth
children.description: The width of the connectors in pixels.

children.name: legendIndex
children.description: The position of the bubble legend in the legend.

samples.name: Bubble legend as last item in legend

children.name: maxSize
children.description: Miximum bubble legend range size. If values for ranges are not specified, the minSize and the maxSize are calculated from bubble series.

children.name: minSize
children.description: Minimum bubble legend range size. If values for ranges are not specified, the minSize and the maxSize are calculated from bubble series.

children.name: ranges
children.description: Options for specific range. One range consists of bubble, label and connector.

children.name: sizeBy
children.description: Whether the bubble legend range value should be represented by the area or the width of the bubble. The default, area, corresponds best to the human perception of the size of each bubble.

children.name: sizeByAbsoluteValue
children.description: When this is true, the absolute value of z determines the size of the bubble. This means that with the default zThreshold of 0, a bubble of value -1 will have the same size as a bubble of value 1, while a bubble of value 0 will have a smaller size according to minSize.

children.name: zIndex
children.description: Define the visual z index of the bubble legend.

children.name: zThreshold
children.description: Ranges with with lower value than zThreshold, are skipped.
